title: catvideofest 2025
description: catvideofest returns to the big screen with cool kitty clips of all kinds, from fresh submissions to sourced animations, music videos, and iconic internet gems. a portion of ticket proceeds from every show will go to local animal shelters and/or animal welfare organizations.
